title: Where can I get content writing projects? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, in this world of internet to find a job as such takes lot of going through. I suggest you to subscribe some sites for this purpose. They actually send quite good option in newsletters. Well, that is all I have for you because I usually look into writing contests. I hope it helps you a little, because to get such projects a person have to figure out their way according to what interests them. Take care and keep writing…

If you want to get more projects join Facebook groups like Individual Content writers needed Article writers needed These groups can help you recruit writers and also provide projects for content writers.
